mapper.select: select CNO, ID, PRICE, PNAME, COUNT, PIMAGE, INAME, PRODUCTID from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(CART_TBL pk_cart) */ rownum rn, CNO, ID, PRICE, PNAME, COUNT, PIMAGE, INAME, PRODUCTID from CART_TBL where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into CART_TBL (CNO, ID, PRICE, PNAME, COUNT, PIMAGE, INAME, PRODUCTID) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{id}, #{price}, #{pname}, 1, #{pimage}, #{iname}, #{productid})
mapper.update: update CART_TBL set count = count+1 where ID = #{id} AND PRODUCTID = #{productid}
